alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 1:16PM MST until January 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 5500 ft, with 1 to 3 inches below 5500 ft inches. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Tuba City and Williams. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute. Snow forecast from 6 PM Today to 5 PM Monday: Doney Park 4 to 6 inches Flagstaff 4 to 6 inches Tuba City 1 to 3 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
